original_title: Lunar Tics In: Find The Platypus
overview: The Lunar Tics are moon-based creatures who are sent on a school excursion to discover new and exciting things on Earthâ€™s largest island, Australia. They show their excitement for learning by breaking out in spontaneous educational songs.

title: Lunar Tics In: Find The Platypus
